column1: Uchi////For starters we order the udamame
column2: which was salted just right. The Uchiviche was one of my favorites of the night. All the ingredients were fresh and crisp. Loved the Zero Sen roll
column3: esp for the sauce! Seemed there was a hint of sesame seeds or sesame seed oil. We also tried the WaluWalu and the Hot Rock beef. Both were good.
